AcqNewArrivalMonthReportBySch

CopyCatSFX
OUHK In-house Library Tool - Accepts a SFX generated MARC source file and remotely fetch call numbers from Z39.50 providers which are defined in config.txt

FetchCounter5Stats  
FetchReportBySchoolAndDates
OUHK In-house Library Tool - Fetch new arrival title report by School and date range from ARC and Aleph Oracle tables.
FetchURLReport
OUHK In-house Library Tool - Fetch URLs with specified material types (the material types are defined in config.txt) from Aleph Oracle tables.

PrimoQueryByISBN

PrimoQueryByNonISBN
